name: Moment of Waking and Resolve
title: Freminet: Moment of Waking and Resolve
in_play_description: After your Freminet, who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: Draw 1 card. (Twice per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Freminet to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Freminet, equip this card.
After Freminet equips this card, immediately use Pressurized Floe once.
After your Freminet, who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: Draw 1 card. (Twice per Round)
(You must have Freminet in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
